I

<lb n="c56-0012__main__28"/>
with

and
generally passed
<lb n="c56-0012__main__29"/>
the
afternoon at our
house
for<lb n="c56-0013__main__1"/> being an only child, and desti<lb n="c56-0013__main__2"/>tute
of
companions at home,
his<lb n="c56-0013__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e678__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e678__End"/>
father was
pleased that he
<lb n="c56-0013__main__4"/>
should find associates at our
<lb n="c56-0013__main__5"/> house
and
we were never com<lb n="c56-0013__main__6"/>pletely happy when Clerval was
<lb n="c56-0013__main__7"/> absent.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0013__main__8"/> In this account
of
my early <lb n="c56-0013__main__9"/> youth I wish particularly to men<lb n="c56-0013__main__10"/>tion<lb n="c56-0013__left_margin__1"/><del loc="c56-0013__left_margin__d1e714__Start"/>record <del loc="c56-0013__left_margin__d1e714__End"/> those circumstances which <lb n="c56-0013__main__11"/> led to and nourished
my
taste <lb n="c56-0013__main__12"/> for that science which was <lb n="c56-0013__main__13"/> the principal amusement
of
my <lb n="c56-0013__main__14"/> boyish days
and
in the enddeci<lb n="c56-0013__main__15"/>ded my destiny. I mentioned before <lb n="c56-0013__main__16"/> my taste for old books
of
chemist<lb n="c56-0013__main__17"/>ry and natural magic and I remem<lb n="c56-0013__main__18"/>ber very well that
I
learned latin <lb n="c56-0013__main__19"/> principally that I might read <lb n="c56-0013__main__20"/> Pliny's Natural History my father <lb n="c56-0013__main__21"/> refusing
to
allow me to read a <lb n="c56-0013__main__22"/> translation.
I
used when very young <lb n="c56-0013__main__23"/> to attend lectures
of
chemistry <lb n="c56-0013__main__24"/> given in Geneva and athough <lb n="c56-0013__main__25"/>
I
did not understand them the <lb n="c56-0013__main__26"/> experiments never failed to <lb n="c56-0013__main__27"/> attract my attention.<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e777__Start"/>I reme<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>mber<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e777__End"/><lb n="c56-0013__main__28"/><del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e788__Start"/>also<del loc="c56-0013__main__d1e788__End"/><gap quantity="22" reason="resequencing" unit="tokens"/><gap quantity="4" reason="resequencing" unit="lines"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0005.06" unit="tei:head"/>Chapt. 2<lb n="c56-0005__main__2"/> Those events which materially influence our fu<lb n="c56-0005__main__3"/>ture destinies <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e812__Start"/>are<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e812__End"/> often <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e817__Start"/>caused<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e817__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e820__Start"/>by slight or<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e820__End"/>derive thier origin from atri<lb n="c56-0005__main__4"/>vial occurence<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e834__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e834__End"/>. <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e837__Start"/>Strange as the<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e837__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e846__Start"/>statement of the<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e846__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e851__Start"/>simple fact<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e851__End"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__5"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e856__Start"/>may appear
my
fate had been<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e856__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e859__Start"/>Chemist<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e859__End"/>Natu<lb n="c56-0005__main__6"/>ral
philosophy
<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e870__Start"/>has<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e870__End"/>
is the genius that has
<lb n="c56-0005__main__7"/>
regulated my
fate
I
<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e877__Start"/>wish<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e877__End"/>desire therefore
in this
account <lb n="c56-0005__main__8"/> of my early years
to
state
those facts which
<lb n="c56-0005__main__9"/>
led to

for that science. When
<lb n="c56-0005__main__10"/>
I was
eleven
years
old
we all went on a party
<lb n="c56-0005__main__11"/>
of pleasure to
<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e921__Start"/>Thonon<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e921__End"/>the
baths
nearThonon.<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e934__Start"/>and were confined there<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e934__End"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e939__Start"/>b<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e939__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e942__Start"/>obil<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e942__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e945__Start"/>obliged by
the
rain<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e945__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e948__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e948__End"/>The
inclemen<lb n="c56-0005__main__13"/>cy of the weather obliged us to remain a day
<lb n="c56-0005__main__14"/>
confined to the inn. In this house I chanced
<lb n="c56-0005__main__15"/>
to find a
<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e971__Start"/>fo<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e971__End"/> volume<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e974__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e974__End"/>
of the Works of Corne<lb n="c56-0005__main__16"/>lius Agrippa.
<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e983__Start"/>And<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e983__End"/>
I opened it with
apathy <lb n="c56-0005__main__17"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e990__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e990__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the
theory
that
he
attempted
to
ddemonstrate
and the wonderful facts
thathe relates <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1004__Start"/>chan<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1004__End"/>
soon changed this feeling
into<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1008__Start"/>continued to re with<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1008__End"/>
enthusiasm. A new
<lb n="c56-0005__main__18"/>
light
dawned
upon my
mind and <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1017__Start"/>I<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1017__End"/><del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1020__Start"/>com<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1020__End"/><lb n="c56-0005__main__19"/>
bounding with
joy
I communicated my
<lb n="c56-0005__main__20"/>
discovery to my father.
I cannot help
here
remark<lb n="c56-0005__main__21"/>ing
the many opportunities
<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1036__Start"/>parents<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1036__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>instructors<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1049__Start"/>have<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1049__End"/>posess<lb n="c56-0005__main__22"/>
of directing the attention of their pupils to
<lb n="c56-0005__main__23"/>
useful knowledge, which they utterly neglect.
<lb n="c56-0005__main__24"/>
My father
looked
carelessly at the
tit<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1063__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1063__End"/>le page <lb n="c56-0005__main__25"/>
of my
book — <del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1068__Start"/>Ah<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1068__End"/>
and
said Ah!
Cornelius
<lb n="c56-0005__main__26"/>
Agrippa!
—
My dear
Victor
do not waste
<lb n="c56-0005__main__27"/>
your time upon
this –
it is sad
trash. <lb n="c56-0005__main__28"/> If
instead of this
remark or rather excla<lb n="c56-0005__main__29"/>mation
my father had taken the pains to
<lb n="c56-0005__main__30"/>exp<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1090__Start"/>ound<del loc="c56-0005__main__d1e1090__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>lain
to
me
that the principles of<lb n="c56-0006__main__1"/> Agrippa had been entirely
exploded. <del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1109__Start"/>And<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1109__End"/><lb n="c56-0006__main__2"/><del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1113__Start"/>aan<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1113__End"/>
and that
<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1118__Start"/>another<del loc="c56-0006__main__d1e1118__End"/>a modernsystem
of science
<lb n="c56-0006__main__3"/>
had been
introduced
which possessed much
<lb n="c56-0006__main__4"/>
greater
power
than the
ancient
because
<lb n="c56-0006__main__5"/>
the powers of the
ancient
were
pretended <lb n="c56-0006__main__6"/> and
chimerical, while those of the
moderns <lb n="c56-0006__main__7"/> are
real and practical; under such
<lb n="c56-0006__main__8"/> circumstances
I should certainly have thrown
<lb n="c56-0006__main__9"/>
Agrippa aside,
and
with
my
imagination
<lb n="c56-0006__main__10"/>
warmed as it
wasshould
probably have

Henry said that <lb n="c56-0015__main__6"/> the Fairies and giants were at <lb n="c56-0015__main__7"/> war and Elizabeth attempted <lb n="c56-0015__main__8"/> a picture of it.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0015__main__9"/> As I grew older my attempts <lb n="c56-0015__main__10"/> in science were of a higher nature. <lb n="c56-0015__main__11"/> I <del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2037__Start"/>endeavou<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2037__End"/> produced little earthquakes <lb n="c56-0015__main__12"/> and tried every kind of combination <lb n="c56-0015__main__13"/> of gasses <del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2045__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0015__main__d1e2045__End"/> and elements to ascertain <lb n="c56-0015__main__14"/>
